function.name: run_enforcement_packet
function.description: Create and initiate an enforcement packet (UCC lien, FOIA request, IRS rebuttal, etc.) for a beneficiary. This is used for trust enforcement actions. Returns the created enforcement packet object.

beneficiary_id.description: UUID of the beneficiary this enforcement is for (required)

target_agency.description: Target agency or organization (optional, e.g., 'IRS', 'Credit Bureau', 'County Recorder')

documents.description: Document references and metadata (optional, JSON object)

auto_send.description: Whether to automatically send the packet (default: false)

returns.description: The created enforcement packet object with status and tracking info

function.implementation_note: This currently creates a draft enforcement packet. Future implementation will include document generation, mailing, and tracking.
